roleset.name: identify incorrectly
roleset.note: MISIDENTIFY-V, MISIDENTIFICATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR.

example.name: misidentify-v
example.text: Caplan-1 has been known *PRO*-1 to wrap his own preferences up and misidentify them as being "rational" while asserting that those he disagrees with have "irrational" preferences.
example.arg: while asserting that those he disagrees with have "irrational" preferences

example.name: misidentification-n
example.text: The pilot stated that he was “fatigued” during the accident flight, which most likely contributed to his misidentification of the landing area.
